title: A redox acceptor–acceptor nitro functionalized naphthalene diimide/rGO anode for sustainable lithium-ion batteries
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,574-583
DOI: 10.1039/D3YA00561E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Madan R. Biradar, Nitish Kumar, Prakash Kumar Pathak, Sidhanath V. Bhosale, Sheshanath V. Bhosale, Rahul R. Salunkhe
This work demonstrates the development of organic material and reduced graphene oxide composites for environment-friendly, stable, and recyclable lithium-ion batteries.
